definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Portable grinders should be handled with care to avoid damaging the grinding wheel.
sentences.chinese: 可动的研磨机小心用手持，避免损伤磨轮。

sentences.english: The moveable horizontal surface of the empennage used for pitch trim.
sentences.chinese: 飞机尾翼的可动水平面，用来控制俯仰配平。

sentences.english: In order to reduce friction, the moving parts of a machine are often oiled.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少摩擦，机器的可动部件常常涂上润滑油。

sentences.english: A single movable pulley moves with the load.
sentences.chinese: 一个单独的可动的滑轮和负荷一起转动。

sentences.english: The asphalt, movable oil and gas shows are quite abundant in the Silurian reservoir in the Tazhong uplift.
sentences.chinese: 塔中隆起志留系中沥青及可动油气显示十分丰富。

definition: to use sb for one's own ends
exoskeleton (the carapace of insects, crabs etc)
